comment.author: 41909278@N08
comment._content:
The T-6G (such as 49-2900) was the result of a remanufacturing process, which took place at Downey, Ca. Changes included a revised cockpit layout, steerable tailwheel, increased fuel (15 gal tank in each outer wing panel), revised landing gear, improved vision canopies, radio mods (multi channel VHF, UHF, ADF receiver).

Doug MacPhail
